mapper.insert: insert into cashbillitem (number, costAmount, memberAmount, bill_id, product_id) values (#{number}, #{costAmount}, #{memberAmount}, #{billId}, #{productInfoId.id})
mapper.update: update cashbillitem set number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, costAmount = #{costAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, memberAmount = #{memberAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_id = #{productInfoId.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, number, costAmount, memberAmount, bill_id, product_id from cashbillitem

select c.id, c.number, c.costAmount, c.memberAmount, c.bill_id, c.product_id, p.id p_id , p.code p_code , p.name p_name , p.price p_price , p.memberPrice p_memberPrice from cashBillItem c left join productinfo p on p.id = c.product_id where c.bill_id = #{billId}
